ui-label: Net Conductive Heat Flux in Sea Ice at the Base
description: Net heat conduction flux at the ice base, i.e. the conductive heat flux from the centre of the lowermost vertical sea-ice grid box to the base of the sea iceÂ (energy flow per sea ice area). Positive for a downward heat flux.
cell-methods: Error: area: time: mean where sea_ice (mask=siconc) not found in cell methods, please register
